pages.text: Due to the popularity of Umamusume Soul, places like training centers have appeared in the village. As a result, Umamusume Soul and Support Cards are often exchanged between villagers. This exchange is called "Transfer". When you register a transfer, you will be paid according to the condition of the item. $(p)Umamusume Crystal and Horseshoe Crystal are important materials for synthesizing Tickets, and the main source is Transfer.
